== Thiruvaniyoor (627955) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thiruvaniyoor is a village in the [[Kunnathunad]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 2677 hectares and harbouring 6413 households with total population of 25327 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrippunithura]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 12438 and female population is 12889. Scheduled Caste Population is 3035 and Scheduled Tribes population is 54. Census Location Code of the village is 627955<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 22233 (87.78%)
* Literate male population: 11095 (89.2%)
* Literate female population: 11138 (86.41%)
